General.Name: Concord International Securities Co Ltd
General.Description: Concord International Securities Co., Ltd provides securities brokerage and underwriting services in Taiwan. It engages in the futures and option trading brokerage business; buying and selling of securities, such as stocks and corporate bonds; provision of consulting services, including capital planning, finance, and operation management; and trading of government and corporate bonds. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 10, Ximen Road, Tainan City, Taiwan

2.Name: Mr. Tin-Ho  Zhou
2.Title: Deputy GM of Fin. Department & Accounting Supervisor
